# URLSession.ResponseDisposition.cancel

**Case**

Cancel the load.

## Declaration

```swift
case cancel
```

## Discussion

Using this disposition is equivalent to calling [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionTask/cancel()] on the task.

## Task dispositions

- **URLSession.ResponseDisposition.allow**: Allow the load operation to continue.
- **URLSession.ResponseDisposition.becomeDownload**: Convert the response for this request to use a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionDownloadTask].
- **URLSession.ResponseDisposition.becomeStream**: Convert the response for this request to use a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionStreamTask].
